column4: I'm just trying to understand if the MBR is located in the /boot partition and if i need to use a different method from standard (one partition installation) in restoring grub as the boot loader after I install xp
no different method.. there is only 1 mbr per disk, same method to replace it
awesome thanks. I've just read on tutorials that winxp overwrites the MBR when installed after linux causing my MBR to only point to XP
yes, then you need to reinstall grub after the win install
